timeline.body: Is there no default formatter for this?
timeline.bodyText: Is there no default formatter for this?
timeline.bodyHTML: Is there no default formatter for this?
timeline.author: 1-alex98

replies.bodyText: not even needed with my suggestion below
replies.author: 1-alex98

timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
if (lastYearQuery.isEmpty()) {
return (String) condition.get().query(new RSQLVisitor());
}
if(isLastYearChecked){
InstantProperty endTime = qBuilder.instant("endTime");
Condition conditionForLastYear = endTime.after(Instant.now().minus(1, ChronoUnit.YEARS), false);
qBuilder.and(condition.get(), conditionForLastYear);
}
timeline.author: 1-alex98
1-alex98
